WRITING.TITLE: 21 (F4R) Belfast - anyone like to keep a stranted rambler company for a few hours?
WRITING.TEXT: im tired and im a mess, but i would love some company while im waiting for the morning. don't worry im too small to be a killer

WRITING.TITLE: 21 [F4R] Belfast want to meet friends in the City
WRITING.TEXT: What can I say? Im working in a backpackers hostel in Belfast City and I want to meet some friendly people so I can build a life here for myself. Im short, im a dancer, and as long as you dont mind a bit of weirdness you should pm me and see where it goes :)
